name: Basic Health Checkup
description: A comprehensive set of basic tests to evaluate your overall health, including blood sugar, cholesterol, and complete blood count.

name: Full Body Master Checkup
description: Covers all essential organ function tests including kidney, liver, thyroid, and complete blood profile for a detailed health assessment.

name: Heart Health Profile
description: Specialized tests to check your heart condition, cholesterol levels, triglycerides, and blood pressure risk indicators.

name: Diabetes Care Package
description: Designed for diabetic patients to monitor blood sugar, HbA1c, kidney function, and lipid profile for effective management.

name: Women's Wellness Package
description: Covers essential tests for women including thyroid, calcium, anemia profile, and vitamin D for overall well-being.

name: Kidney Function Profile
description: Includes urea, creatinine, and electrolyte tests to assess kidney health and detect early dysfunctions.

description: Tests for Vitamin D, B12, and other essential nutrients to detect deficiencies that affect energy and immunity.

description: Comprehensive package for seniors covering bone health, diabetes, cholesterol, heart, and liver profiles.

name: Pre-Marital Screening

name: COVID Recovery Package
description: Monitors post-COVID recovery including lung, heart, and inflammation-related parameters.
